mapper.select: SELECT EXCELALL_ID, EXCEL_ID, TIME, IN_CALL_ANSWER, IN_AVERAGE_HOLDING_TPC , OUT_CALL_ANSWER, OUT_AVERAGE_HOLDING_TPC, SERVICE_CAPACITY, CAPACITY_NEEDED , IN_TOTAL_HOUR, OUT_TOTAL_HOUR , OCCUPANCY_HOUR, OCCUPANCY_RATE FROM EXCEL_REPORT_ALL WHERE EXCEL_ID IN(SELECT EXCEL_ID FROM EXCEL_REPORT WHERE EXCEL_ID = #{excelId}) ORDER BY TIME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXCEL_REPORT (EXCEL_NAME, EXCEL_DATE, WEEK, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{excelName}, #{excelDate}, #{week}, #{createDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EXCEL_REPORT_ALL WHERE EXCEL_ID = #{excelId} ORDER BY TIME ASC

select sum(IN_CALL_ANSWER) as inCallAnswerTotal , sum(IN_AVERAGE_HOLDING_TPC) as inAverageHoldingTPCTotal , sum(OUT_CALL_ANSWER) as outCallAnswerTotal , sum(OUT_AVERAGE_HOLDING_TPC) as outAverageHoldingTPCTotal , sum(SERVICE_CAPACITY) as serviceCapacityTotal , sum(CAPACITY_NEEDED) as capacityNeededTotal from EXCEL_REPORT_ALL where EXCEL_ID = #{excelId}

SELECT * FROM EXCEL_REPORT
WHERE
EXCEL_NAME LIKE concat("%", #{excelName}, "%")
AND
EXCEL_DATE = #{excelDate}
ORDER BY EXCEL_NAME DESC, DATE_FORMAT(EXCEL_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') DESC
select * from ( SELECT * FROM EXCEL_REPORT WHERE EXCEL_NAME LIKE concat("%", #{excelName}, "%") ORDER BY CAST(OCCUPANCY_RATE AS DECIMAL(9,2)) DESC ) e limit 1
